projects.title: Trash Prince
projects.subtitle: A shopping experience with personality.
projects.description: Trash Price is a fashion brand based in Toronto. They needed a web experience that reflected their individuality and forward thinking. One that would best represent them to shoppers world-wide.
projects.para1: The design is an extension of the brand’s emphasis on customer relations and the special moments created with their packaging, achieved through instant film photo galleries. This way of viewing each product as though it were captured on instant film is enhanced by paper-like animations and the ability to click and drag around the photos.
projects.para2: The Trash Price ecommerce website was developed with WordPress and the Woocommerce extension. This low cost solution was perfect for their small business.

projects.para1: The design is an extension of the brand’s emphasis on customer relations and the special moments created with their packaging, achieved through instant film photo galleries. projects.title: Artifact
projects.subtitle: Redesigning the student journalist experience.
projects.description: Artifact is a Toronto based online news publication for students, by students. They needed a website redesign that would encourage contribution and pave the way for their future.
projects.para1: We discussed the organization of the website extensively to come up with a suitable solution that would expand with the project and include each one of their goals. We decided to separate the content into three sections; one for important and time-sensitive articles, titled News & Features; one for opinion editorial articles, titled  Opinion; and a final section dedicated to advice for new journalists and students of the trade, titled Dear Journalism Student. These sections coupled with the tags shown in the navigation, provide an outline of Artifact’s content.
projects.para2: The website was built with WordPress which was chosen for its easily navigated interface for uploading new content. I met with Artifact’s administrator to explain just how easy it is to create new articles and provided notes on each of the customizable aspects of the website.
